languages.text: "В деле Скорбящего Сонма Вольный Торговец не вынес{mf||ла} приговор, бросив чрезвычайную ситуацию на самотек. Воители Сонма взяли штурмом обитель астропатов и казнили мастера Праса, посмертно выявив его причастность к заговору предателя Кунрада Войгтвира. В результате преступного попустительства Вольного Торговца Даргонус был охвачен волнениями, а астропатический хор понес тяжелые потери".

"The Rogue Trader did not deliver a verdict in the Doleful Host trial, thus leaving events to take their course during an emergency. Host warriors stormed the Astropaths' abode, executed Master Pras, and posthumously discovered his connection to a plot instigated by the traitor Kunrad Voigtvir. As a consequence of the Rogue Trader's criminal connivance, unrest broke out on Dargonus, and the Astropathic Choir took heavy casualties."
languages.original_text: "В деле Скорбящего Сонма Вольный Торговец не вынес{mf||ла} приговор, бросив чрезвычайную ситуацию на самотек. Воители Сонма взяли штурмом обитель астропатов и казнили мастера Праса, посмертно выявив его причастность к заговору предателя Кунрада Войгтвира. languages.text: “行商浪人没有对阴沉之主一案做出判决。尽管事态紧急，但行商浪人依然对此听之任之。在此之后，阴沉之主冲进了星语者的据点，处决了普拉斯大师，之后发现此人与叛徒昆拉德·维特威尔的阴谋有所牵连。由于行商浪人对犯罪行为的纵容，达戈努斯爆发了骚乱，而星语唱诗班也遭受了惨重伤亡。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader did not deliver a verdict in the Doleful Host trial, thus leaving events to take their course during an emergency. Host warriors stormed the Astropaths' abode, executed Master Pras, and posthumously discovered his connection to a plot instigated by the traitor Kunrad Voigtvir. As a consequence of the Rogue Trader's criminal connivance, unrest broke out on Dargonus, and the Astropathic Choir took heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人没有对阴沉之主一案做出判决。尽管事态紧急，但行商浪人依然对此听之任之。在此之后，阴沉之主冲进了星语者的据点，处决了普拉斯大师，之后发现此人与叛徒昆拉德·维特威尔的阴谋有所牵连。由于行商浪人对犯罪行为的纵容，达戈努斯爆发了骚乱，而星语唱诗班也遭受了惨重伤亡。”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーはドールフル・ホストの裁判で判決を下さなかったため、緊急事態の中で状況は勝手に進行しました。ホストの戦士たちは感応通信官の住居を急襲し、マスター・プラスを処刑しました。その後、彼が裏切り者クンラッド・ボイトヴィルによる陰謀に関与していたことが判明しました。ローグトレーダーが犯罪を共謀した結果、ダルゴナスで騒乱が勃発し、感応通信聖歌隊は多くの犠牲者を出しました」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader did not deliver a verdict in the Doleful Host trial, thus leaving events to take their course during an emergency. Host warriors stormed the Astropaths' abode, executed Master Pras, and posthumously discovered his connection to a plot instigated by the traitor Kunrad Voigtvir. As a consequence of the Rogue Trader's criminal connivance, unrest broke out on Dargonus, and the Astropathic Choir took heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーはドールフル・ホストの裁判で判決を下さなかったため、緊急事態の中で状況は勝手に進行しました。ホストの戦士たちは感応通信官の住居を急襲し、マスター・プラスを処刑しました。その後、彼が裏切り者クンラッド・ボイトヴィルによる陰謀に関与していたことが判明しました。ローグトレーダーが犯罪を共謀した結果、ダルゴナスで騒乱が勃発し、感応通信聖歌隊は多くの犠牲者を出しました」

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sprach kein Urteil im Prozess gegen den Traurigen Gastgeber, wodurch die Ereignisse während einer Notlage ihren Lauf nahmen. Krieger des Gastgebers stürmten die Heimstatt der Astropathen, richteten Meister Pras hin und entdeckten im Anschluss seine Verbindung zu einem Komplott des Verräters Kunrad Voigtvir. Als Konsequenz dieser Duldung durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} brachen auf Dargonus Unruhen aus, und der astropathische Chor erlitt schwere Verluste."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader did not deliver a verdict in the Doleful Host trial, thus leaving events to take their course during an emergency. Host warriors stormed the Astropaths' abode, executed Master Pras, and posthumously discovered his connection to a plot instigated by the traitor Kunrad Voigtvir. As a consequence of the Rogue Trader's criminal connivance, unrest broke out on Dargonus, and the Astropathic Choir took heavy casualties."

Als Konsequenz dieser Duldung durch {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} brachen auf Dargonus Unruhen aus, und der astropathische Chor erlitt schwere Verluste."

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, Konakçı'nın yargılamasında hüküm vermeyip olağanüstü hâl içinde hadiseleri kendi seyrine bıraktı. Konakçı savaşçıları, Astropat yurdu­nu basıp Üstat Pras'ı infaz ettiler. Ölümü ardından Pras'ın hain Kunrad Voigtvir'in tertiplediği komployla bağlantısı ortaya çıktı. Hür Tacir'in bu suça karşı kayıtsızlığı yüzünden Dargonus'ta kargaşa patlak verdi, Astropatik Koro ağır zayiat verdi."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader did not deliver a verdict in the Doleful Host trial, thus leaving events to take their course during an emergency. Host warriors stormed the Astropaths' abode, executed Master Pras, and posthumously discovered his connection to a plot instigated by the traitor Kunrad Voigtvir. As a consequence of the Rogue Trader's criminal connivance, unrest broke out on Dargonus, and the Astropathic Choir took heavy casualties."

Hür Tacir'in bu suça karşı kayıtsızlığı yüzünden Dargonus'ta kargaşa patlak verdi, Astropatik Koro ağır zayiat verdi."

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no se pronunció con un veredicto en el juicio de la Hueste Doliente, dejando así que los eventos siguieran su curso a pesar de la urgencia que requería la situación. Los guerreros de la Hueste asaltaron la residencia de los Astrópatas, ejecutaron al maestro Pras y descubrieron de forma póstuma su vinculación con una conspiración instigada por el traidor Kunrad Voigtvir. A consecuencia de la complicidad criminal de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, se desató la agitación en Dargonus y el Coro de Astrópatas sufrió graves pérdidas».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader did not deliver a verdict in the Doleful Host trial, thus leaving events to take their course during an emergency. Host warriors stormed the Astropaths' abode, executed Master Pras, and posthumously discovered his connection to a plot instigated by the traitor Kunrad Voigtvir. As a consequence of the Rogue Trader's criminal connivance, unrest broke out on Dargonus, and the Astropathic Choir took heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente no se pronunció con un veredicto en el juicio de la Hueste Doliente, dejando así que los eventos siguieran su curso a pesar de la urgencia que requería la situación. Los guerreros de la Hueste asaltaron la residencia de los Astrópatas, ejecutaron al maestro Pras y descubrieron de forma póstuma su vinculación con una conspiración instigada por el traidor Kunrad Voigtvir. A consecuencia de la complicidad criminal de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, se desató la agitación en Dargonus y el Coro de Astrópatas sufrió graves pérdidas».

languages.text: « Comme {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'a pas rendu de verdict lors du procès du Concile des Affligés, les événements ont simplement suivi leur cours dans cette situation d'urgence. Les guerriers du Concile ont pris d'assaut le siège des astropathes, exécuté maître Pras et découvert ensuite qu'il était impliqué dans un complot fomenté par le traître Kunrad Voigtvir. À cause de la connivence criminelle {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, des troubles ont éclaté sur Dargonus et le chœur astropathique a subi de lourdes pertes. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader did not deliver a verdict in the Doleful Host trial, thus leaving events to take their course during an emergency. Host warriors stormed the Astropaths' abode, executed Master Pras, and posthumously discovered his connection to a plot instigated by the traitor Kunrad Voigtvir. As a consequence of the Rogue Trader's criminal connivance, unrest broke out on Dargonus, and the Astropathic Choir took heavy casualties."
